item.title: Datapio YAML file reference
item.description: DatapioFile Note: Must be called datapio.yml and located at the root of the repository. Field Type Description release string Release name to group the artifacts environments map string to Environment Project's environment definitions by environment's name artifacts Artifact array Artifacts definition Environment Seen in: DatapioFile Field Type Description branch string Source branch for environment's deployments Artifact Seen in:
